<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Unlink a collection due date from a location by Txid"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/pix/collection-due-date/txid/{txid}/location"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Endpoint to unlink a collection due date from a location passing a Txid (clientRequestId) from a collection.

  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"txid","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  body={undefined}
